description.displayText:
I was hoping to hire Michael to look after my friends son who was coming from out of town for two weeks, a couple evenings a week.  He seemed wonderful while we interacted - he was prompt in his responses, and seemed very eager.  
The day that he was supposed to come - he never did.  He did text my friend later that night saying something about losing his phone in the subway.  The next day, he was supposed to come again -- radio silence. I've texted him, emailed, and messaged him through care.com (I was really getting worried) --- but no response.  I do hope that you are OK, Michael, and that you would have the decency next time to at least give families a heads up that you won't be coming in.

description.displayText:
Michael was a caregiver for our two sons (preschooler and fourth grader) on two occasions in the past few months. My interaction with Michael during the hiring process was smooth. He responded promptly and ensured that he comes across as a trustworthy person by providing me with the information that would make me comfortable with having him taking care of our sons.
Our sons got along with Michael instantly. They felt he was super fun to be with who would play with them, have a conversation with them on various topics, and keep them busy and active. He watched our children in an indoor play area and an outdoor park. Both occasions were super fun for our children. Michael is reliable, punctual, and flexible about working around any issues that come along. I highly recommend Michael!

description.displayText:
Michael babysat our three young boys for several years when he was only in high school - how time flies. We trusted Michael more with our children than we have with any other teenager, simply because he was 100 percent reliable: always on-time, always full of energy, always a load of fun. 

What he says in his profile is true: if you want a sitter to stick your kids in front of the tube, he will. If you want them to learn and laugh and grow, hire him.

description.displayText:
We hired Michael for an after school job with our 2.5 year old. Our son loves him and so do we. 

Michael was reliable, responsible and fun. I'm very pregnant and not too mobile, so Michael helped safely walk my son home from school each day. Our son loved playing with Michael every day and as parents we found Michael to be super accommodating. 

Additionally, our son has some developmental delays that Michael was extremely sensitive to. We will definitely be hiring Michael again.
